overview.summary: Compute the value of the nodes based on the data from the adjoining elements. This module supports various operations to map element data to node data.
overview.description: Compute the value of the nodes based on the data from the adjoining elements. This module supports various operations to map element data to node data. Supported methods are: AVERAGE - Compute the average of adjoining elements MIN - Compute the minimum value of adjoining elements MAX - Compute the maximum value of adjoinint elements SUM - Compute the sum of the adjoining elements INTERPOLATE - Compute a weighted average of the adjoining elements
